Sign up into StrikeTec and learn technique, workout routines, training tips and more with the easy to use mobile app.
Account Confirm Password Continue
First Name is required. Last Name is required. Email is required. Password is required. Current password is required. New password is required. Confirm password is required. Password and Confirm Password has to be same. New password and Confirm Password has to be same. Password has to be more than 8 chractors Email is invalid. Password needs at least one uppercase Password needs at least one special character Password needs at least one lowercase Password needs at least one number
Forgot Password Type your email address and soon you\'ll receive an email with instructions. Submit Cancel No Account Found No one with that email address was found. Try again It\'s All Good You just received an email with a code, put it here and we will allow you to reset your password CODE Reset Password Input your new password to continue Current Password New Password Confirm New Password
Profile Questions Let us know your preferences so we can recommend you a proper training to achieve your goals. Country State City Gender Date of birth Weight Height Stance
Please choose gender Please chosse birthday Please choose weight Please choose height Please choose stance
Training Plans Let us know your preferences so we can recommend you a proper training to achieve your goals. Fat Loss Cardio & Conditioning Box like a Professional
Connect Wearable Connect your sensors and start competing, training and improving! I\'LL START AS AN SPECTATOR GET YOUR WEARABLE RIGHT NOW! Search for near devices
Spectator As an spectator you\'ll be able to follow users, view their activity and profiles. But you won\'t be able to do trainings, challenges, games or tournaments, in order to do that you need to acquire the wearable. Searching for Devices
Found %1$s Devices Connect devices for left and right arms before continuing. Set for Left Arm Set for Right Arm
Wearable StrikeTec\'s hardware tracks the orientation of your Arms & Legs in order to give you instant feedback to your mobile device. Skip
Track Your Progress Track your progress by every day, week and month
Challenges Participate in One-on-One battles, Compete with others in our hosted competitions and enjoy some custom games designed to increase your skills on the bag. Earn Your Belt Earn badges for participating in battles, competitions and games. Earn a new belt as your performance increases during your workouts.
